name: PIXEL DRIFT
description: Now you need to overtake the enemy on the track and not turn over while doing it!
minimum_requirements: OS: xp, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel atom 1.2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 8 8.1 10 Processor: Intel Core I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any
